relationships.relationship: The National Labor Relations Board judge found that Starbucks violated federal labor law.

relationships.head: Starbucks
relationships.relationship: Starbucks increased wages and offered new perks and benefits only to non-union employees.

relationships.head: Starbucks
relationships.relationship: Starbucks has violated labor law in its efforts to stop unions from forming in its coffee shops.

relationships.relationship: Su Wenqiang is a Cambodian national

relationships.relationship: Su Wenqiang's passport states he is from Fujian

relationships.head: Su Wenqiang
relationships.relationship: Su Wenqiang was arrested at a location along Lewis Road

relationships.relationship: Su Wenqiang was arrested in Bukit Timah

relationships.relationship: Su Wenqiang possessed proceeds from illegal remote gambling offences

relationships.head: Meta
relationships.relationship: Meta was fined by European Union regulators.

relationships.head: Meta
relationships.relationship: Meta owns Facebook.

relationships.head: Meta
relationships.relationship: Meta transferred personal data of Facebook users to servers in the United States.

relationships.head: European Union
relationships.relationship: The European Union fined Meta for transferring data to the United States.

relationships.head: European Data Protection Board
relationships.relationship: The European Data Protection Board announced the fine against Meta.

relationships.head: European Data Protection Board
relationships.relationship: The fine followed an inquiry by the Irish Data Protection Commission.

relationships.head: Irish Data Protection Commission
relationships.relationship: The Irish Data Protection Commission conducted an inquiry into Meta.

relationships.head: General Data Protection Regulation
relationships.relationship: The GDPR is a data privacy law of the European Union.

relationships.head: General Data Protection Regulation
relationships.relationship: Meta violated the GDPR by transferring data to the United States.

relationships.head: Zhang Ruijin
relationships.relationship: Zhang Ruijin was sentenced in Singapore for his involvement in a money laundering case.

relationships.head: Zhang Ruijin
relationships.relationship: Zhang Ruijin was ordered to forfeit around S$118 million of his assets.

relationships.head: Zhang Ruijin
relationships.relationship: Zhang Ruijin's assets were originally seized by the police.

relationships.head: Zhang Ruijin
relationships.relationship: Zhang Ruijin is the fifth of 10 accused persons to be dealt with in relation to the case.

relationships.head: Zhang Ruijin
relationships.relationship: Zhang Ruijin pleaded guilty to two counts of forgery-related offences.

relationships.head: Zhang Ruijin
relationships.relationship: Zhang Ruijin failed to satisfactorily account for property reasonably suspected to be benefits from criminal conduct.

relationships.head: Department of Education
relationships.relationship: The Department of Education imposed a $14 million fine on Liberty University for violations of a campus safety law.

relationships.head: Liberty University
relationships.relationship: Liberty University is located in Virginia.

relationships.head: Department of Education
relationships.relationship: The Department of Education imposed a fine for violations of the Clery Act.

relationships.head: Liberty University
relationships.relationship: Liberty University violated the Clery Act.

relationships.head: Liberty University
relationships.relationship: Liberty University agreed to spend an additional $2 million to improve on-campus safety following the Department of Education's review.

relationships.head: Department of Education
relationships.relationship: The Department of Education initiated the review in 2022.

relationships.head: Liberty University
relationships.relationship: A lawsuit was filed against Liberty University in 2021.

relationships.head: Liberty University
relationships.relationship: 12 women claimed that Liberty University created an environment that increased the likelihood of sexual assault and rape.
